title: DataflowEvent
description: The envelope for events on in the dataflow streams.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the event.

tid.title: TenantID
tid.description: The ID of the tenant this event belongs to.

sid.title: SourceID
sid.description: The NRN of the source that generated this event.

jid.title: JobID
jid.description: The NRN of the job that generated this event.

bid.title: BatchID
bid.description: The NRN of the batch (run of a job) that generated this event.

rid.title: RecordID
rid.description: A value that uniquely represents the record or resource most relevent to the event.

rids.title: RecordIDs
rids.description: The RID value for each event bundled into this event.

cid.title: CorrelationID
cid.description: A value used to track the event's movement through the system and to assign causality.

m.title: Metadata
m.description: Metadata to be transferred with the event.
